title: Senior Director, Head of Legal EMEA
content:
SENIOR DIRECTOR, HEAD OF LEGAL, EMEA 
Ivalua is a leading provider of cloud-based procurement solutions globally
THE OPPORTUNITY
We are seeking an entrepreneurial, quick-thinking, and pragmatic Player/Coach attorney to lead our growing EMEA legal team. This individual will work cross-functionally and lead a team of lawyers responsible for the negotiation, execution, and all requisite legal support for commercial deals with Ivalua’s customers and partners.
 
WHAT YOU WILL DO WITH US
 

Lead, manage and develop Ivalua’s inhouse and external team of lawyers supporting SaaS and professional services contract negotiations with European customers on complex commercial and technology matters
Work cross-functionally with key executives and stakeholders across the business to provide business-oriented legal support and process efficiency, proactively identify issues, share potential concerns, and craft solutions in supporting the commercialization of our industry-leading products and services
Structure, draft, negotiate and advise on a variety of technology and commercial agreements, including terms governing Ivalua’s e-procurement solution, implementation services agreements, reseller relationships, professional services and other technology agreements
Provide legal support for the company’s privacy, data, and security initiatives as they relate to technology and commercial agreements
Counsel internal clients and manage legal team’s efforts related to contract compliance, governance and dispute resolution matters, serve as a resource to Ivalua’s customer success, customer support, finance and other organizations with respect to ongoing contract and legal matters

YOUR PROFILE
Skills and Experience
If you have the below experience and strengths this role could be for you

Minimum 7 – 10 years practicing (with at least 5 years in a technology company’s in-house legal department) and/or top law firm focusing on enterprise SaaS and software-related negotiations and transactions in EMEA
Minimum 3-5 years of management (direct supervisory) experience leading and mentoring small legal teams; exhibits natural leadership qualities in being a team player, yet comfortable making decisions and interacting with customers and colleagues at all levels
Nimble, action-oriented commercial lawyer who can design and manage effective and scalable commercial processes while employing a collaborative interpersonal style that will build bridges across stakeholders.
Prior technology/IT industry experience with subject matter expertise in information security, data/privacy, and public sector/regulated industry contracting practices
Business-oriented and creative problem solver; excellent business judgment and ability to assess legal risk while also thinking strategically and providing sound, practical advice under tight deadlines and when presented novel scenarios
French/English fully bilingual and German fluency a plus.
Exceptional written and verbal communication and analytical skills, particularly in French and English language contract negotiating and drafting
Energized by working in a fast-paced and dynamic team environment

WHAT WE CAN DO FOR YOU

An innovative and stimulating work environment.
Great training and career development – working with EMEA’s largest and most respected companies as customers, interfacing directly with Ivalua senior management, and navigating diverse and challenging legal projects on a daily basis
You will work with a diverse and global team made up of exceptionally passionate, talented, and motivated colleagues who are established leaders in their field
Regular social events, team sports or musical activities (under normal conditions)
We pride ourselves in customer experience, Agility, Pragmatism, Positive attitude and enthusiasm, Team play, Continuous learning and Improvement and accountability
Ivalua received the Happy @ work France and Germany 2020
we have scooped a hat-trick of awards at Comparably’s latest companies ranking: Best Company Culture, Best Company for Women and Best Company for Diversity!

 
COMPANY OVERVIEW
A “Magic Quadrant” leader, Ivalua’s solutions work in a complex global economy.  Our innovative Source-to-Pay solutions include automating customized workflows to source, contract, request, procure, receive, and pay for goods and services across the enterprise, refining the procurement lifecycle while reducing cost and risk of spending on indirect goods, direct goods and services, and improving supplier collaboration.
All companies want the best and brightest. At Ivalua, we also want team members who have a global point of view and who bring customer-focused enthusiasm and ambition to the table. We are a company of doers, of problem solvers, of figure-it-outers. We have fun and we work hard. This is a truly global company with a diverse team of contributors and a set of core values that people can feel every day across all our offices.
For more information, please visit us on www.ivalua.com or check us out on LinkedIn.com
Check out our video and find out Who We Are!
Join Ivalua today and procure a great future for your career!
